item.title: Hugo 升级后编译时 can't evaluate field RSSLink in type *hugolib.pageState 问题解决方案
item.description: 问题描述 升级了 Hugo 框架之后，编译博客时遇到如下报错： Error: Error building site: failed to render pages: render of "page" failed: execute of template failed: template: page/single.html:3:5: executing "page/single.html" at <partial "head.html" .>: error calling partial: "/home/xxxx/themes/LeaveIt/layouts/partials/head.html:42:8": execute of template failed: template: partials/head.html:42:8: executing "partials/head.html" at <.RSSLink>: can't evaluate field RSSLink in type *hugolib.pageState

item.title: Hugo LeaveIt 主题修改代码块底色

item.title: Hugo实现LaTex渲染
item.description: Hugo框架本身并不支持LaTex，但是可以通过javascript进行渲染。Hugo官网上提供了多种方法，权衡之后我选择了较为简单的KaT

item.title: Hugo 添加标签页卡图标
item.description: 将需要的图标图片保存为PNG格式放到static目录下即可 可以用一些Favicon生成工具先将图片制作成比较标准的图标，此前介绍过一款很方便
